title: International Journal of Science and Mathematics Education
summary: The International Journal of Science and Mathematics Education is a bimonthly peer-reviewed academic journal published by Springer Science+Business Media on behalf of the National Science Council of Taiwan. It covers science and mathematics education topics and research methods, particularly ones with cross-curricular dimensions or which explore the area from different cultural perspectives.[1] The journal was established in 2004 with Fou-Lai Lin (National Taiwan Normal University). The current editor-in-chief is Hsin-Kai Wu (National Taiwan Normal University).
